name: Exclusive Rule Engine
bz: Specialized adaptation for CMS vulnerabilities (such as WordPress, Discuz, ThinkPHP), primarily aimed at defending against RCE attacks.

name: WordPress Defense In Depth
bz: Protects against WordPress component vulnerabilities, such as login brute force and permission bypass attacks.

name: ThinkPHP Vuln Patch
bz: Adapts high-risk vulnerabilities in the ThinkPHP framework, without code implementation, to provide vulnerability protection.

name: General Web Vuln
bz: Covers common vulnerabilities such as XSS, SQL injection, etc., and provides basic web attack protection.
